title: Local fishermen protest in Colombo against Indian poaching
content: Local fishermen staged a protest in Colombo today (23) against poaching by India in Sri Lankan waters.The agitation opposite the Fort Railway Station drew members from several unions of their trade.Protestors demanded authorities take action to ensure that they engage in their livelihood in their seas without any threat from Indian fishermen.They accused the poachers of destroying Sri Lankaâ€™s marine resources.
